title: Is Football on the Brink of Cancellation?
itunes:title: Is Football on the Brink of Cancellation?
description:
Earlier this week two of the NCAA's power 5 conferences decided to postpone fall football. The Pac 12 and Big 10 will not play any games until at least 2021. Jon Stashower, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the effects this may have over the rest of the NCAA and how it could alter the NFL's plans to get back on the field. We also discuss the thrilling finish to golf's first major in the covid-19 era. Was 23-year-old Collin Morikawa's dazzling final round enough to bring views back to golf? Well find out…

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
